name: BlackTube (Black YouTube)
description:
BlackTube (09-01-17 Update) - After many hours of coding, YouTube has changed the whole code! Yay! LOL! Here's a quick update to get you back in black, a static header bar & side menu (search bar & left menu), & lots of annoying things hidden. 

https://i.imgur.com/VgmuRfI.png
https://i.imgur.com/otUYreP.png
additional_info:
BlackTube (09-01-17 Update) - After many hours of coding, YouTube has changed the whole code! Yay! LOL! Here's a quick update to get you back in black, a static header bar & side menu (search bar & left menu), & lots of annoying things hidden. 

https://i.imgur.com/VgmuRfI.png
https://i.imgur.com/otUYreP.png

These Chrome Extensions are HIGHLY recommended:
